oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Century II Promotions Talent Agency Half Sheet Advertisement (18387)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Jennings, Waylon; Kershaw, Doug; Street, Mel, 1935-1978; Wynette, Tammy, 1942-1998; Lynn, Judy, 1936-2010; Fargo, Donna; Lee, Brenda, 1944-; Mandrell, Barbara; Smith, Margo; Milsap, Ronnie; Wiseman, Mac; Robbins, Marty; Statler Brothers; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on green) advertising Century II Promotions Talent Agency and the musical acts signed on with them. Acts include Waylon Jennings, Tammy Wynette, Judy Lynn, Ronnie Milsap, Doug Kershaw, Donna Fargo, Barbara Mandrell, Mac Wiseman, Mel Street, Brenda Lee, Margo Smith, Marty Robbins, Tommy Overstreet, and the Statler Brothers. Poster features metal photoplates of all the acts. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41730/
